channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-22235] OperationStatus.{SUCCESS|FAILURE|NOT_RUN} are not visible to 3rd party coprocessors
item.description:
preBatchMutate is useless for some operation due to this.

See also TEPHRA-299. This looks like an oversight.

MiniBatchOperationInProgress has limited visibility for coprocessors. OperationStatus and OperationStatusCode should have the same.
item.summary: OperationStatus.{SUCCESS|FAILURE|NOT_RUN} are not visible to 3rd party coprocessors

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Since it is immutable and can be retrieved by calling methods in the Region interface which is visible to CPs, I think it is fine to also make it visible to CPs.

I found a different (and better) way to solve TEPHRA-299, but I still think this should be fixes. In fact I want to change it for HBase 1.5.x.

apurtell

It needs two changes: (1) change the visibility label, and (2) make OperationStatus.{SUCCESS|FAILURE|NOT_RUN} public.
Sounds good to me
Attached patches for branch-2/master and branch-1

-1 overall
